El preludio del final de Half Life esta aquí en este episodio. Es un juego hermoso con un final que se te queda grabado en la cabeza, recomendadisimo para jugarlo pero no sin antes haberte jugado todos los anteriores HLs, me cuesta escribir esta reseña. Es una historia de 1 en un 1.000.000.
It is really sad that your own childhood game that you've played ends up in cliffhanger, and the ONLY next installment won't solve that cliffhanger. And oh, the newest is VR only. And you're broke.
Świetna graficznie , lepsza od EP1 i dłuższa (ok 6 godzin) polecam , teraz czekam na HL: Alyx :)
BEST, EPIC & BAD ASS! HALF LIFE 3?

Liked it even more than the base game. But perhaps that's because I loved the base game in the first place. Has some really great moments and roaming about in wilderness was great for a change.

 Also, this one is much easier than HL2. Developers haven't toned down on threat in any way. Infact, when in Half life you battle several Striders one after another, here, [spoiler] in the final battle, you face several Striders at once along with hunters. [/spoiler] . What helps here is that they have given you better things to throw, more useful physics objects lying around, more explosives and more health pickups. Such conveniences weren't simply there in HL2. The game utilizes Gravity gun to the fullest and there are even enemies that are weaker to thrown physics objects. It's a great experience when played with gravity gun and most parts can be beaten without using any other weapon.
Более разнообразней первого эпизода и чуть длиннее, проходится на одном дыхании как и 13 лет назад.

Этот шедевр, просто требует 3 часть.
Ничего больше сказать нечего.
Ну спорно так же цена ,но и сюжет ОН НЕ ЗАКОНЧЕН!!!Я надеюсь что если даже когда нибудь будет 3 халва будет закончена и мы доживём до этого /)
Друге годне і останнє продовження для годної гри...
Теперь я тоже присоединяюсь к ждунами, которые ждут 3 часть

Great follow up to episode one. The addition of a select few new enemies is nice, with them possibly being the best enemies in the series in my opinion, and the initial area is one of my favorites in terms of visuals. Furthermore, the environmental variation is great while still matching the overall setting. I really like how chapters are individually chunked and unfold in their own well-crafted and differently themed area. The story offers some rather surprising moments that create a good amount of tension and lead to a number of entertaining situations. Lastly, the physics-based puzzles and battles are constantly varied and interesting, as always. Really excellent title.

Kim bilir belkide çıkar.(Ayrıca episode 1'e göre 2 kat daha uzun bir oynanış süresi sunuyor.)

It's a staple of the gaming industry, all parts of Half-Life.  Even if you lose immersion after playing gmod and wondering why things aren't ragdolling and have a story, it's a very compelling experience and I can see why the *steam community has been begging for a continuation of this series.

Also, there's something about launching a gnome into space in the achievements list.  I have no idea what that is but I'll have to do another run because that sounds awesome.

这游戏太好玩啦，如果有第三部就更好啦

A definite improvement over Episode One which felt more like filler designed solely to get Alyx and Gordon out of City 17, Episode Two, while still not on par with Half-Life 2, feels like a genuine expansion of the universe and story with some great combat sequences along the way. 

I can't say it's a satisfying conclusion to the Half-Life 2 story as a result of the by now legendary cliffhanger (I kind of wish the Episodes never happened because they spoil the nicely wrapped up ending of Half-Life 2), but it certainly justifies its existence more than Episode 1.

[h1]Review For The Game Half-Life 2: Episode Two[/h1]

The game's best quote: [b]Prepare for unforeseen consequences.[/b]

This game was a blast.

This was the game I expected when I started playing Half-Life 2: Episode One. There's new enemies, weapons 
and characters. The story feels more compelling and easier to follow. You get to drive a car for the first time in a while.
Another thing I love about this game is its gameplay value. You're really invested in the story at this point (if you've played every Half-Life game in the correct order) and you really want to see what's going to happen. This game is great in both its gameplay and storytelling. Another thing I LOVED about this game is its more cooperative approach.
One thing I hated about this game is its ending. It's a shame that we'll never see a third installment... VALVE!!?

+ Great story.
+ Great characters.
+ Great physics.
+ Great A.I.
+ Great experience all around.
+ Great controls
+ New weapons and therefor new gameplay.
+ Refreshing.
+ Ending in the Half-Life series on a high note.

[spoiler][b]9.5/10[/b] Perfection![/spoiler]

Jogo sensacional e com esse final, nossa, agora eu sei o pq dos fas quererem um Half Life 3 pra ontem.

The gameplay and story feel drawn out.  I don't know quite how but this game feels more dated and boring than HL1.  My sympathies to Alyx or the other characters this game tries to build up were unmoved.  Freeman is the ultimate silent protagonist to a fault.  The events at their wildest felt bagged, I realized this during the prolonged Antlion tunnel attack.  Don't look back on this one.
I wonder if they're gonna make an episode 3.

Difficile  vers la fin mais super histoire.
even better, but, well, this is the end.....
Great overall. Still waiting on episode three...
This game is really amazing to play! It should be free for the people who wanted to buy it but can't afford it!

Не умею писать обзоры..
Знаком с серией Half Life еще с 2006 года,тогда я узнал про 2ю часть,прошел ее и потом начал искать и проходить 1ые(+Блю Шифт,Оппосинг Форс),2я часть + эпизоды.
Сюжет,загадки,атмосфера,драма и некоторые отношения персонажей между собой,и,наконец,довольно красивая графика для начала 2000х даже сейчас все смотрится очень приятно,опрятно!Ждал продолжения серии,но увы,Valvle и Габен забили на продолжение..Аликс не в счет,т.к. это не продолжение,а событие между частями!
Тем,кто не знаком со вселенной Half Life - обязательно к прохождению!
